description: Models the page lifecycle and inline script execution for the provided LinkedList example HTML. The page has no interactive controls; the script runs on load and performs list operations automatically.
notes: No interactive buttons, inputs, or controls are present. The exact DOM element selectors found in the HTML are: html, head, title, body, h1, p, script. The inline script defines functions (appendNode, insertAtEnd, removeElement, printList) and invokes them immediately on load; therefore transitions reflect page load -> script execution -> completion. There are no clickable triggers in the document.
